taskGroup.name: Managing Graph Models & Tests LifeCycle
taskGroup.onCompletion: Congratulations you have completed all the tasks.

taskGroup.name: Use an existing project within Eclipse
taskGroup.intro:
Introduction
We will use the java-amazon project to start. This is a project provided by the GraphWalker project and is available for download.

task.name: Convert a project
task.intro:
In the following steps we will convert an existing project. It will be based on the GraphWalker java-amazon example.
https://github.com/GraphWalker/graphwalker-example/tree/master/java-amazon

task.name: Run a test
task.intro: Introduction After having converted an existing GraphWalker project, you will launch directly the tests within the Eclipse IDE.

task.name: Update the test
task.intro: Introduction While working on your project, you will necessarily update your graph models and then regenerate your tests interfaces and implementations.
